author: Andrey Tarantsov <andrey@tarantsov.com>
name: pine2e-file-uploads-pg
description: Pine2e plugin that handles file/image uploads and stores the uploaded data in a PostgreSQL database

scripts.cov: rm -rf lib-cov; jscoverage lib lib-cov; env JSLIB=lib-cov mocha -R dot && env JSLIB=lib-cov mocha -R html-cov >coverage.html; open coverage.html
